Introduction

VIXX LR (or simply LR) was the first sub-unit of the boy group VIXX, featuring members Leo and Ravi. They made their debut on August 17, 2015 with the mini album, "Beautiful Liar".

The unit is assumed to have disbanded following Ravi's departure from the group.
